possible changelog added server sync functionality incomplete overhaul data layer split data_access.js separate file item.js items.js creator.js etc made creator collection first class object similar item constructor take first parameter e.g new zotero.item 1234 book allow explicit setting changing made various data layer operation including attachment field require save rather making direct change better handling unsaved object item.setcreator take creator object instead creator item.save auto save unsaved creator clone work unsaved object newly created object instance disabled save force refetch globally accessible instance using zotero item creator etc .get added secondary lookup key data object deprecated getid getitemtype method favor .id .itemtypeid property toarray deprecated favor serialize somewhat modified format added support multiple creator identical data currently unimplemented interface data layer added item.diff comparing item metadata database change added sqlite trigger enforce foreign key constraint added flag run vacuum transaction added retrieve consistent timestamps entire transaction properly store bit integer set pragma locking_mode exclusive database set sqlite page size 4096 new database set sqlite page cache 8mb database cleanup integrity checking migration 1.0 branch removed exists userdata.sql create statement userdata.sql processed initialization removed itemnotetitles table moved title itemnotes abstracted metadata edit box note box flexible xbl binding various mode including read state massive speed item tree view several fix 1.0 branch fx3 compatibility added notifier observer log delete event syncing change new method getsqldatatype md5 removed onerror display 1024 character dopost debug output display
